Allen Iverson had 26 points, nine assists, and combined with Linas Kleiza , JR Smith and Eduardo Najera on a 14-1 fourth-quarter spurt that carried the Nuggets to a 125-114 victory over the New Jersey Nets on Friday night. We've been struggling, losing two on the road and we just wanted to do anything to get a win, Allen Iverson said after scoring 21 second-half points to help the Nuggets break a two-game losing streak. government repays others who invest in U.S. Treasury bonds. "It's an IOU that is backed by Treasury bonds and the faith and credit of the United States government," said Sen. Bernie Sanders , I-Vt. It is the same faith and credit that enables us to borrow from rich people and from China and from other countries. As you well know, in the history of this country, the United States has never defaulted on one penny owed to a creditor. American Idol's season-one co-host Brian Dunkleman admits to having been extremely freaked out the first time he saw Simon Cowell tell someone they should never sing again. It's one thing to watch it on television, but then you spend time with these kids and you have to look at them right in the eyes, and then their mother is looking at you, like, "What just happened?'? the outgoing Google chief had to say in a recent guest article for Harvard Business Review. In the piece, Eric Schmidt talks about how mobile stuff is perhaps the biggest thing at Google for 2011.
